爱尔兰斩剑(claymore Irish)  是由古塞尔特巨剑(giant sword Celtic)演化而来,类似苏格兰斩剑,也是用于斩击的极端武器,并同苏格兰斩剑一样一直使用到中世纪结束.

英格兰斩剑(claymore Scottish)  出现在十一世纪的大型斩击剑,由古塞尔特巨剑(giant sword Celtic)演化而来,极端的步兵武器。全长1.4到2米,剑柄三握以上,有.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from Scottish Gaelic claidheamh 'sword' + mór 'great'

means.word_mean: 1. a large double-edged broadsword; formerly used by Scottish Highlanders
2. an anti-personnel land mine whose blast is aimed at the oncoming enemy
